verses.text: Then \w came|strong="H7126"\w* the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, of the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*: and these \add are\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of his \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*; \w Mahlah|strong="H4244"\w*, \w Noah|strong="H5270"\w*, and \w Hoglah|strong="H2295"\w*, and \w Milcah|strong="H4435"\w*, and \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*.

And they \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* and all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, \add by\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Our \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and he was not \w in|strong="H8432"\w* the \w company|strong="H5712"\w* of them that gathered themselves \w together|strong="H3259"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the \w company|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*; but \w died|strong="H4191"\w* in his own \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*, and had no \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

Why should the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of our \w father|strong="H0001"\w* be done \w away|strong="H1639"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* his \w family|strong="H4940"\w*, because he hath no \w son|strong="H1121"\w*? \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* unto us \add therefore\add* a \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* of our \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 27.4 \ft done…: Heb. diminished\f*
And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* their \w cause|strong="H4941"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

The \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w right|strong="H3651"\w*: thou shalt \w surely|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them a \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* their \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*; and thou shalt cause the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of their \w father|strong="H0001"\w* to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* unto them.

And thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, If a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and have no \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, then ye shall cause his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* unto his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.
And if he have no \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, then ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* unto his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.
And if he have no \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, then ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* unto his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

And if his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* have no \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, then ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* unto his \w kinsman|strong="H7607"\w* that is \w next|strong="H7138"\w* to him of his \w family|strong="H4940"\w*, and he shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it: and it shall be unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Get thee \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into this \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Abarim|strong="H5682"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And when thou hast \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* it, thou also shalt be \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* unto thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, as \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* was \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w*.

For ye \w rebelled|strong="H4784"\w* against my \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* in the \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Zin|strong="H6790"\w*, in the \w strife|strong="H4808"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, to \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* me at the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* before their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: that \add is\add* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Meribah|strong="H4809"\w* in \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Zin|strong="H6790"\w*.
¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Let the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w spirits|strong="H7307"\w* of all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w set|strong="H6485"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* over the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*,

Which may go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, and which may go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, and which may lead them \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and which may bring them \w in|strong="H0935"\w*; that the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be not as \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* which have no \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* thee \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* in whom \add is\add* the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon him;

And \w set|strong="H5975"\w* him \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*; and give him a \w charge|strong="H6680"\w* in their \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add some\add* of thine \w honour|strong="H1935"\w* upon him, that all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* may be \w obedient|strong="H8085"\w*.

And he shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, who shall \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \add counsel\add* for him after the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* of \w Urim|strong="H0224"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: at his \w word|strong="H6310"\w* shall they go \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and at his \w word|strong="H6310"\w* they shall come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, \add both\add* he, and all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him, even all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him: and he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and \w set|strong="H5975"\w* him \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*:

And he \w laid|strong="H5564"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon him, and gave him a \w charge|strong="H6680"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H1696"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
